description:
Young Merchant visits with the Winter Kingdoms Finical Minster with an interesting proposal, as Demons and the Kingdoms soldiers start to march for war.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Kowashitari Koroshitari Suru Bakkari de, Nannimo Tsukuttenai Kara"
I Just Destroy and Kill, Without Creating Anything.
｢壊したり殺したりするばっかりで, 何にも作ってないから｣
